-- database: HSQL Database Engine 2.2.4

-- driver: HSQL Database Engine Driver 2.2.4
-- driver class: org.hsqldb.jdbc.JDBCDriver
-- url: jdbc:hsqldb:mem:schemacrawler
-- jdbc compliant: true

CREATE TABLE AUTHORS
(
  ADDRESS1 VARCHAR,
  ADDRESS2 VARCHAR,
  CITY VARCHAR,
  COUNTRY VARCHAR,
  FIRSTNAME VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  LASTNAME VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  POSTALCODE VARCHAR,
  STATE VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE BOOKAUTHORS
(
  AUTHORID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  BOOKID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  "UPDATE" CLOB
);

CREATE TABLE BOOKS
(
  DESCRIPTION VARCHAR,
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  PRICE DOUBLE,
  PUBLICATIONDATE DATE,
  PUBLISHERID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  TITLE VARCHAR NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "Global Counts"
(
  "Global Count" INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE PUBLISHERS
(
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  PUBLISHER VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE REGIONS
(
  CITY VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  COUNTRY VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  POSTALCODE VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  STATE VARCHAR NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE SALES
(
  BOOKID INTEGER,
  COUNTRY VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  PERIODENDDATE DATE,
  POSTALCODE VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  TOTALAMOUNT DOUBLE
);
